about_the_game:
Boardmancer is a fresh twist on the deckbuilding roguelike genre, where the board itself becomes your deck. Roll your dice to move around the board, customize your board with powerful abilities, and face dynamic enemies who share and interact with the same board, turning every move into a strategic challenge.

Unlike traditional deckbuilders where you play cards, Boardmancer lets you craft and play your board. Each tile has unique abilities that can be activated by spending energy after landing on them, offering endless strategic possibilities. Combine this with the ability to collect and customize dice with unique sides and special effects, and you’ll experience a roguelike where both your board and dice define your playstyle.

Enemies in Boardmancer are not passive obstacles—they’re active participants. They move across the board alongside you, using its mechanics to their advantage and creating a dynamic battlefield where strategy and adaptability are key.
